verses.verse: Surely God <S%H430><s%> is good <S%H2896><s%> to Israel, <S%H3478><s%> to those who are pure <S%H1249><s%> in heart. <S%H3824><s%>
But as for me, <S%H7272><s%> my feet were almost <S%H4592><s%> gone. <S%H5186><s%> My steps <S%H838><s%> had nearly <S%H369><s%> slipped. <S%H8210><s%>
For I was envious <S%H7065><s%> of the arrogant, <S%H1984><s%> when I saw <S%H7200><s%> the prosperity <S%H7965><s%> of the wicked. <S%H7563><s%>
For there are no struggles <S%H2784><s%> in their death, <S%H4194><s%> but their strength <S%H193><s%> is firm. <S%H1277><s%>
They are free from burdens <S%H5999><s%> of men, <S%H582><s%> neither are they plagued <S%H5060><s%> like <S%H5973><s%> other men. <S%H120><s%>
Therefore pride <S%H1346><s%> is like a chain <S%H6059><s%> around their neck. <S%H2555><s%> Violence covers <S%H5848><s%> them like a garment. <S%H7897><s%>
Their eyes <S%H5869><s%> bulge <S%H3318><s%> with fat. <S%H2459><s%> Their minds <S%H3824><s%> pass the limits <S%H5674><s%> of conceit. <S%H4906><s%>
They scoff <S%H4167><s%> and speak <S%H1696><s%> with malice. <S%H7451><s%> In arrogance, <S%H4791><s%> they threaten <S%H1696><s%> oppression. <S%H6233><s%>
They have set <S%H8371><s%> their mouth <S%H6310><s%> in the heavens. <S%H8064><s%> Their tongue <S%H3956><s%> walks <S%H1980><s%> through the earth. <S%H776><s%>
Therefore their people <S%H5971><s%> return <S%H7725><s%> to them, <S%H1988><s%> and they drink <S%H4680><s%> up waters <S%H4325><s%> of abundance. <S%H4392><s%>
They say, <S%H559><s%> "How does God <S%H410><s%> know? <S%H3045><s%> Is there <S%H3426><s%> knowledge <S%H1844><s%> in the Most High? <S%H5945><s%>"
Behold, <S%H7563><s%> these are the wicked. Being always <S%H5769><s%> at ease, <S%H7961><s%> they increase <S%H7685><s%> in riches. <S%H2428><s%>
Surely in vain <S%H7385><s%> I have cleansed <S%H2135><s%> my heart, <S%H3824><s%> and washed <S%H7364><s%> my hands <S%H3709><s%> in innocence, <S%H5356><s%>
For all day <S%H3117><s%> long have I been plagued, <S%H5060><s%> and punished <S%H8433><s%> every morning. <S%H1242><s%>
If I had said, <S%H559><s%> "I will speak <S%H559><s%> thus; <S%H3644><s%>" behold, <S%H898><s%> I would have betrayed the generation <S%H1755><s%> of your children. <S%H1121><s%>
When I tried <S%H2803><s%> to understand <S%H3045><s%> this, <S%H5999><s%> it was too painful for me; <S%H5869><s%>
Until I entered <S%H935><s%> God <S%H410><s%>'s sanctuary, <S%H4720><s%> and considered <S%H995><s%> their latter end. <S%H319><s%>
Surely you set <S%H7896><s%> them in slippery places. <S%H2513><s%> You throw them down <S%H5307><s%> to destruction. <S%H4876><s%>
How they are suddenly <S%H7281><s%> destroyed! <S%H8047><s%> They are completely <S%H5486><s%> swept away <S%H8552><s%> with terrors. <S%H1091><s%>
As a dream <S%H2472><s%> when one wakes <S%H6974><s%> up, <S%H136><s%> so, Lord, when you awake, <S%H5782><s%> you will despise <S%H959><s%> their fantasies. <S%H6754><s%>
For my soul <S%H3824><s%> was grieved. <S%H2556><s%> I was embittered <S%H8150><s%> in my heart. <S%H3629><s%>
I was so senseless <S%H1198><s%> and ignorant. <S%H3045><s%> I was a brute beast before you. <S%H929><s%>
Nevertheless, <S%H8548><s%> I am continually with you. <S%H270><s%> You have held my right <S%H3225><s%> hand. <S%H3027><s%>
You will guide <S%H5148><s%> me with your counsel, <S%H6098><s%> and afterward <S%H310><s%> receive <S%H3947><s%> me to glory. <S%H3519><s%>
Whom do I have in heaven? <S%H8064><s%> There is no one on earth <S%H776><s%> whom I desire besides you. <S%H2654><s%>
My flesh <S%H7607><s%> and my heart <S%H3824><s%> fails, <S%H3615><s%> but God <S%H430><s%> is the strength <S%H6697><s%> of my heart <S%H3824><s%> and my portion <S%H2506><s%> forever. <S%H5769><s%>
For, <S%H7369><s%> behold, those who are far from you shall perish. <S%H6><s%> You have destroyed <S%H6789><s%> all those who are unfaithful to you. <S%H2181><s%>

But <S%H589><s%> it is good <S%H2896><s%> for me to come close <S%H7132><s%> to God. <S%H430><s%> I have made <S%H7896><s%> the Lord <S%H136><s%> Yahweh <S%H136><s%> my refuge, <S%H4268><s%> that I may tell <S%H5608><s%> of all your works. <S%H4399><s%>
